description: The most immature guy in Shuuji`s circle of friends. Nori is a shy and naive highschooler, who believed that the war would never reach their hometown and they should stop worrying about it. He desperately wants to have a girlfriend, and is slightly jealous of Take for having one. He later gets a crush on a second-year girl named Miho but it is unknown if his feelings are reciprocated.
name: Nori
